title: finnmarket website
summary: I have helped www.finnmarket.fi owner to build a website for his business. The site is built on shopify by customizing one of shopify themes. I am also regularly providing support services to him whenever he needs changes on his website for example integrating different apps, editing website layouts, adding new product collections...

title: Softrain project
summary: While working as trainee software developer at Softrain Blobs Oy, my main task was to rewrite the Logitar software using React and Node js.For this task, my tools choice were Next js as react framework and tailwind css for styling.

title: Memory-Game
summary: Simple memory game build with React. Hope you enjoy it!

title: Crypto-currency tracker
summary: This app built with Next Js gives current overall information about crypto-currency values on the market.

title: Iphone-Stopwatch
summary: My attempt to clone the Iphone Stopwatch !

title: Countries info
